//Onboarding Strings
WELCOME TO MENDER! This apps lets users look for handyman\'s nearby to help them with problems they are facing.
CREATING A REQUEST Simply write a title, description, provide contact information, upload a photo of the problem area, and that\'s it! From there, our contractors will handle the rest!
TIMER INTEGRATION With an integrated work timer Mender tracks the hours worked for each job. Ensuring customers will only be charged for hours worked.
PAYMENT GATEWAY All payments are done through our application, which utilizes Stripe.com\'s secure payment processing service, ensuring no financial data is stored on our servers.
Start Add a Picture! Decline Account
// About Us texts
My name is David Ring and I am the owner of Mender. I am a licensed, bonded, and insured contractor that has been working in the construction industry for the last 12 years. I am one of the lucky individuals who very much enjoys their job, the type of work I do, so I decided that I would share this love of helping people with other contractors, and thus, Mender was born. Mender is a lead provider of a select group of well trained, background checked, fully bonded and insured contractors. Users can simply create an account, post a task description, upload at least 1 picture and you’re done! From there the contractors will have an opportunity to accept your job, based on the contractor’s availability. If the contractor accepts the job, you will then be contacted immediately to set up a time for the contractor to come by and fix that problem of yours. Once the appointment is set up, the contractor will show up to your listed location and address the issue. The contractors keep track of their time through our app, ensuring you only pay for the time worked, and nothing more. If new parts are needed, our contractors will even run to the store for you and pick up any parts needed to complete the project. This is referred to as Drive Time which you will see represented in the bill. For more information about this, please see the Billing section below. After the contractor has completed the job, they will ensure that the totals on the invoice are correct and end the job. Once a job has been closed, the customer may pay the invoice directly through the app. We use Stripe.com to handle all transactions, ensuring no credit card or other financial data is stored on our servers. After a successful payment has been made, we send you an email receipt complete with an itemized list of charges. Mender is a small business. A local business who just wants to support the little guys and put food on their table. We are not a corporation or franchise. We support local businesses and those who support their community through their own small businesses. Our main goal here at Mender is to do away with the corporations that exploit our hardworking contractors and to give them a chance to prove their skill and support their communities. We also prioritize development and make it our mission to help teach the skills necessary to become a self-sustaining business owner in a small community.
Handyman are just that. Handy. We excel at fixing things and enjoy the challenge of a project. We enjoy helping out in our communities. But with that said, we are not licensed Electricians, or Plumbers, or Architects. We are just men and women who enjoy helping out others with their small projects. /n If you have a project at home that may require a licensed professional to fix it, please feel free to post the project to our app, but understand that we may have to turn it down if we feel or local codes dictate that the project requires a licensed professional. Eventually, we hope to work with licensed professionals on this application, but for now, Mender is solely focused on minor home repair services. So what services are included in minor home repairs? Well here is short and incomplete list of services that we provide:
\u2022 Faucet repair/replacement \n \u2022 Garbage disposal repair/replacement \n \u2022 Sink repair/replacement \n \u2022 Troubleshooting for plumbing \n \u2022 Cabinet repair\n \u2022 Door planning and resizing \n \u2022 Door knob repair/replacement\n \u2022 Door repair/replacement\n \u2022 Lock changing\n \u2022 Key copying\n \u2022 Appliance troubleshooting\n \u2022 Landscaping\n \u2022 Garbage removal\n \u2022 Moving services\n \u2022 Electrical troubleshooting\n \u2022 Light Fixture Installation/repair\n \u2022 Power washing\n \u2022 Deck repair/replacement/staining\n \u2022 Painting\n \u2022 Smoke detector repair/replacement\n \u2022 CO2 monitor and smoke detector installation\n \u2022 Drywall repair\n \u2022 Wall Texturing\n \u2022 Fence building/repair\n \u2022 Ikea furniture assembly\n \u2022 Plus, much more!\n
Basically any minor home repair project you can throw at us, we can take care of. If you didn’t find your project in this list, don’t worry! We are ever expanding and learning new skills with each job. So please, post that project so we can help you, and learn something new! All of our billing has been integrated into our app through Stripe.com’s secure payment processing center. None of your financial data will be store or ever go near our servers. We have specifically designed Mender this way to ensuring a safe, secure, and efficient way to process payments. So now that we know how we process the payments let go over the charges themselves:
//Rates page Mender charges $75 per hour for labor time with a 1 hour minimum. We charge $75 per hour because that’s the market rate for such great contractors. These guys work hard and we want to ensure that they are taken care of. The hour minimum is to ensure the trip to the project site is worth the contractors time. In a lot of cases, most jobs can be completed in under half an hour. I guess our contractors are just that good. Mender charges $40 per hour of drive time with no minimum. We charge $40 for drive time because in most cases, a drive to the hardware store and back will only take 10 – 15 minutes. Depending on the location of the site in relation to the closest hardware store. This charge covers the contractors time, and gas. We also have found that this is a cheaper alternative to just keeping the labor clock running, so we can pass those savings onto you. Mender adds the cost of materials automatically to our invoices. This is one of our favorite features of our app that we are very excited to present. If a contractor needs to go to the hardware store for parts, they simply take a picture of the receipt, upload it through our app, input the amount, and from there, the material cost is automatically added to the customer’s final invoice. The material receipt is then attached to the customer’s copy and after successful payment, emailed to the customer. We hope this information was easy to understand and informative. Mender is and always will be a growing company and with your support we can really make a difference in our community. With a focus of independence and self-sufficiency, Mender will strive to help connect small businessmen and women to their community and ensure that all of our customers and their project are taken care of and handled with professionalism, efficiency, and care. Thank you very much for considering Mender and we look forward to assisting you in future projects.
Apply as Handyman Rates Services If you’re interested in working with Mender as a Lead provider then first off, Thanks! It means a lot to have such great support in the community! We like to keep things simple here, so fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible. We usually reply within 24 hours. When we do get back to you, you will have a chance to send a resume and other documents.
